tabs-overflow.text: Lindo does'nt support more than 6 tab per window, above that it can be laggy and buggy. But you can open a new window and it will be working just fine.

notifications.tax-collector: A tax collector is being attacked !
notifications.party-invitation: You are invited to join {{character}}'s group.

information.error: Can't download the update ! Please try again later

resolution.confirm-body:
Does the current resolution suit you?
Automatic reset within 10 seconds..

general.disable-inactivity: Extend the delay before disconnection for inactivity
general.health-bar: Activate the display of the life bars below the fighters

about.title: About
about.text0: Lindo is an open-source software that allows you to play DOFUS Touch from your computer.
about.text1: Unlike an Android emulator, the code is directly interpreted by your computer, which makes faster so you can play DOFUS Touch whith the full performance of your computer !
about.text2: Originally known as DOFUS Touch No-Emu, this software developed by Daniel and Thomas was forced to close cause of an avertissement from Ankama.

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.description1: You can use special keys CTRL, SHIFT, SPACE, ALT (CTRL = cmd on Mac OS X)
shortcuts.description2: You can specify your shortcut by pressing the desired keys at the same time after selecting the input

auto-group.warning: Beware, following the group leader can be considered as a boting for other players, use it with caution and in unpopulated areas.
auto-group.explanation-1: The characters in the group must be friends with the leader so that the invitation is automatic.
auto-group.explanation-2: The members follow the leader if the latter is on the same map.
auto-group.follow-on-map: Follow the leader on a map
auto-group.strict-move: Move on the same cell the leader moves
auto-group.pvp-warning: You can't join a PvP fight automatically

multi-account.home-no-master: To use this feature, a password must be configured. It will be used to start Lindo with multi-account automation.

request-master-password.explanation: To access your account management, you must first enter your master password. This password was set on the first activation of the multi-account.
request-master-password.label: Enter your password

add-master.title: Setting the Password
add-master.min-lenght: The password must contain at least {{lenght}} characters
add-master.success-text: The password will now be used to start the application.

edit-master.title: Changing the password
edit-master.min-lenght: The new password must contain at least {{lenght}} characters

delete-master.title: Removing the password
delete-master.text:
In order to delete the password, it must be confirmed.
This will delete the saved accounts.
delete-master.incorrect-old: The password entered is not correct.

maximum-account.title: Oops!
maximum-account.text: You can not save more than 4 accounts with Wabbit donor rank.

add-account.title: Adding an account
add-account.min-lenght-login: The username must contain at least 1 character
add-account.min-lenght-password: The password must contain at least 1 character

edit-account.title: Changing an account
edit-account.min-lenght-login: The username must contain at least 1 character
edit-account.min-lenght-password: The password must contain at least 1 character

general.title: General
general.focus-fight-turn: Automatically switch to an account when its turn starts
general.sound-focus: Game sound only on foreground window

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: You can receive notifications from the game when the application is on the background. You will be notified:
notifications.tax-collector: When a tax collector is attacked
notifications.party-invitation: When someone invites you to join a group

reset-option.text:
By continuing, all parameters will be reset.
This operation is not reversible.
